the_coffee_arc.name: Latte
the_coffee_arc.product_detail: This Latte-hued bag is a perfect blend of minimal elegance and everyday versatility. Inspired by the warmth of your favorite brew, it's designed to complement any look effortlessly.
the_coffee_arc.additional_details: Sleek gold-tone hardware, an adjustable strap, and a lightweight design. An additional charge of Rs. 100 applies for COD.

the_coffee_arc.name: Mocha
the_coffee_arc.product_detail: Rich and versatile, the Mocha bag is the perfect balance of elegance and everyday charm. Inspired by the comforting hues of your favorite coffee, it's designed to pair seamlessly with any look.
the_coffee_arc.additional_details: Sleek gold-tone hardware, an adjustable strap, and a lightweight design. An additional charge of Rs. 100 applies for COD.

the_coffee_arc.name: Espresso
the_coffee_arc.product_detail: Deep, rich, and effortlessly classic—the Espresso bag is a statement of confidence and sophistication. Inspired by the boldness of your favorite brew, it's the perfect go-to for any occasion.
the_coffee_arc.additional_details: Sleek gold-tone hardware, an adjustable strap, and a lightweight design. An additional charge of Rs. 100 applies for COD.

the_malibu_collection.name: Moonlight Bay
the_malibu_collection.product_detail: Moonlight Bay captures the essence of evenings by the ocean—cool, airy, and soothing. The bluish-grey shade adds a polished, modern touch while staying subtle enough for daily wear. Designed to complement both casual and elevated outfits, it’s the perfect choice for anyone who loves understated luxury with a relaxed coastal vibe.
the_malibu_collection.additional_details: Designed with sleek gold-tone hardware, a comfy adjustable strap, and a lightweight feel — plus, you get one charm free! COD carries an extra Rs. 100 fee.

the_malibu_collection.name: Coral Coast
the_malibu_collection.product_detail: The Coral Coast bag channels the spirit of warm sunsets and breezy coastal days. With its soft pink hue, it adds a touch of playful elegance to any outfit. Designed for everyday ease, it brings a perfect blend of charm and functionality—your ideal companion for days when you want your style to feel fresh, bright, and effortlessly confident.
the_malibu_collection.additional_details: Designed with sleek gold-tone hardware, a comfy adjustable strap, and a lightweight feel — plus, you get one charm free! COD carries an extra Rs. 100 fee.

the_malibu_collection.name: White Coast
the_malibu_collection.product_detail: White Coast is inspired by serene shores and soft, calming waves. Its refined off-white tone pairs seamlessly with every look, making it your most versatile go-to piece. Minimal yet striking, this bag elevates your everyday style with quiet sophistication and a timeless aesthetic that never goes out of fashion.
the_malibu_collection.additional_details: Designed with sleek gold-tone hardware, a comfy adjustable strap, and a lightweight feel — plus, you get one charm free! COD carries an extra Rs. 100 fee.
